entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , St. John's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:09 AM NST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 04:30 AM NST Saturday 21 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -0.8°C
Wind: ENE 41 km/h gust 56 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 21 January 2023
